english.segment1: (Verse 1). Velvet black night. Pierced with white. Stars waiting quiet. Wide listening sky
english.segment2: Stillness of air. Life hanging there. Out of despair. Rises a prayer
english.segment3: (Pre-Chorus). Can we take in Your light. So we can shine like You?. With all this weariness. Can we shine like You?. With this weariness
english.segment4: (Chorus). O we are loved. We are loved. And it's quite enough that. We are loved
english.segment5: We are loved. We are loved. And it's quite enough that
english.segment7: If the whole world could feel like. If the whole world could feel like. We could love. We could love. 'Cause we are loved
english.segment8: (Verse 2). Surrounded in white. O purest bride. No lovelier sight. The church will rise
english.segment9: Take in Your light. To shine like You. Take this weariness. O we can shine like You
